definitions.definition: An internal signal that replaces research, ethics, and customer feedback with a low-grade serotonin burst and a vague sense of destiny.
definitions.usage: We were going to A/B test the landing page but my Founder Gut said ship it in Comic Sans.
definitions.author: Carter Wynn

definitions.definition: The entrepreneurial equivalent of 'trust me bro' but with more conviction and less data.
definitions.usage: My Founder Gut says we should pivot to blockchain. No, I haven't talked to any users.
definitions.author: Anonymous Contributor
